about.card3Desc:
Passionate about fullstack development, I particularly enjoy building applications from A to Z. üé® On the frontend side, I thrive in the React ecosystem, where TypeScript allows me to code with confidence and precision.

‚ö°Ô∏è The backend doesn't fall behind: I love creating robust APIs with Express.ts, always keeping maintainability and scalability in mind.

I firmly believe that code quality is just as important as the end result. That's why I particularly appreciate TypeScript, which allows me to produce safer and better-structured code. üéØ

lightzino.title: Lightzino
lightzino.subtitle: Design and Development
lightzino.longDescription: An innovative online casino platform using cryptocurrencies as payment method. The project integrates modern casino games with an intuitive user interface and secure transactions.

ilc.title: ILC
ilc.subtitle: Design and Development
ilc.description: Web application for managing international mobility.
ilc.longDescription: Web application for complete management of international mobility for IUT Annecy students. The site allows visualization (with filters) of destinations. Students can manage their wishes and administrators can make decisions to validate destination choices.

features.4: Site element management (articles, events, destinations, users)

fifa.title: Fifa
fifa.subtitle: Design and Development
fifa.longDescription: An online store specialized in football products, offering a wide range of equipment and accessories for football enthusiasts.

fullstack.title: FULLSTACK DEVELOPER
fullstack.description: Development of a complete application for managing students' overseas semesters, featuring a public section accessible to all and a private section allowing students to manage their travel preferences, documents, and personal information.

polyvalent.title: VERSATILE EMPLOYEE
polyvalent.description: Management and maintenance of self-service checkout systems. Additionally, support to fresh produce staff, assisting with shelf restocking, product presentation, and expiration date management.

helpHub.title: WEB DEVELOPMENT PROJECT
helpHub.description: As part of IUT coursework, creation of a website cataloging action posts from associations. Users can log in and modify site elements based on their role (administrator, association, etc.).

webmecanik.title: WEB DEVELOPER INTERN
webmecanik.company: Webmecanik, CRM Marketing Software and Tools
webmecanik.description: Learning web development fundamentals (HTML, CSS, and JavaScript) through OpenClassrooms platform, under company professionals' supervision. Assistance with code correction and application update deployments.
